archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of the University Librarian, University of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the University Librarian, University of Virginia, #RG-12/1/1.101, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were an archival transfer from Alderman Library through Margaret Peak, Special Projects Manager, on February 18, 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the papers of the University Librarian, including subject files, library funds reports, personnel records, committee files, etc. ca. 1967–1981, 12,600 items (14 cubics and one Hollinger box, ca. 17.5 linear feet).

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are arranged in four series: Series I: General Files (A-Z), arranged alphabetically (Cubics 1-9); Series II: Miscellaneous Files (Cubics 9-10); Series III: Bound Library Funds Reports (Cubics 11-12); and Series IV: Personnel Records, including one restricted box (Cubics 13-14, and Box 15)
